column2: film= [[The Lord of the Rings (film series)

column1: Australian actor and director '''John Noble''' (born 1948) played [[Denethor]] in ''[[The Lord of the Rings (film series)
column2: ''The Lord of the Rings'' (film series)]]. In the credits of the [[The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers (extended edition)
column3: Extended edition]] of ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers]]'', he is accidentally credited as "John Nogle".

column2: The main thing about Denethor is that he's a father, which is something I can relate to very strongly. The approach I took was he's a powerful father, a good man, but he's inexorably drawn to his own destruction because of his grief.

column1: * [[2004]] - '''[http://www.bfca.org/ Critics' Choice Award]''', Best Acting Ensemble, ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King]]''
* 2004 - '''[http://www.nbrmp.org/ NBR Award]''', Best Acting by an Ensemble, ''Peter Jackson's The Return of the King''
* 2004 - '''[http://www.sagawards.org/ SAG Award]''', Outstanding Performance by a Cast in a Motion Picture, ''Peter Jackson's The Return of the King''
